title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Presidio Resonate: AI Agents Orchestrating Multimodal Data at Scale (DAT101)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Presidio Resonate: 大规模编排多模态数据的AI代理 (DAT101)
abstract: Enterprises are awash in unstructured data—video, audio, text, and images—spread across siloed systems. Presidio Resonate changes the game. Built on AWS, Resonate is an AI-native, agent-driven platform that ingests, normalizes, and links data across modalities in real time. Using graph-based reasoning and LLM-powered workflows, it transforms scattered assets into orchestrated intelligence ready for action. In this session, see how sports, media, finance, and public sector organizations are using Resonate to accelerate content packaging, surface hidden insights, and deliver personalized experiences—at scale. Learn how to break down data silos, boost operational speed, and unlock new value from your content. This presentation is brought to you by Presidio, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 企业被大量非结构化数据淹没——视频、音频、文本和图像——分散在孤立的系统中。Presidio Resonate改变了游戏规则。基于AWS构建，Resonate是一个AI原生、智能体驱动的平台，可实时摄取、标准化并链接跨模态数据。利用基于图的推理和LLM驱动的工作流，它将分散的资产转化为可操作的编排智能。在本次会议中，了解体育、媒体、金融和公共部门组织如何使用Resonate来加速内容打包、发现隐藏洞察并大规模提供个性化体验。学习如何打破数据孤岛、提升运营速度并从内容中释放新价值。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Presidio为您呈现。

presenter.name: Neerav Shah
presenter.title: Industry Principal, Media Entertainment and Sports
